column4: Everyone, including men, should wear a bra everyday. It feels great. I am a man and I wear a bra everyday as well. Do yourself a favor and wear a bra everyday. Sign up for this message board for men who like to wear bras: http://www.websitetoolbox.com/mb/hellotaxi
